name: study2_cohort
title: Emergency Hospitalized Patients with Primary Diagnosis of Heart Failure
description: This cohort includes ambulatory patients visited the Emergency Department (admitted or not) with a primary discharge diagnosis of heart failure. The primary discharge diagnosis refers to the main clinical condition responsible for the hospital admission (if admitted) or the code assigned in the Emergency Department if the patient is not admitted.

entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

entity.name: encounterId
entity.description: A unique identifier for each hospital encounter.

entry.name: patientAmbulatoryEncounter
entry.description: Captures ambulatory visits/encounters to the Emergency Department.

entry.name: patientEmergencyDepartmentAdmission
entry.description: Captures encounters where the patient was admitted through the Emergency Department.

period.description: Includes all encounters for the defined cohort population.

eligibility.name: withHeartFailure
eligibility.description: Filters patients with a diagnosis of heart failure during the hospital encounter.

criteria.description: Filters patients with a diagnosis of heart failure during the hospital encounter.
